Title: Chromium: Multiple vulnerabilities
Synopsis:
Multiple vulnerabilities have been found in Chromium, the worst of
    which can allow remote attackers to cause Denial of Service.

Background.Text: Chromium is an open-source web browser project.

Description.Text: Multiple vulnerabilities have been discovered in Chromium. Please review the CVE identifiers referenced below for details.

Impact.Text: A remote attacker may be able to cause a Denial of Service condition or possibly have other unspecified impact by leveraging improper handling of render-tree inconsistencies.

Workaround.Text: There is no known workaround at this time.

P.Text: All Chromium users should upgrade to the latest version:
